message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
Alice, my turn. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  This round is our best chance to secure a good deal before inflation eats into the value.
Bob, time is running out. I'm sticking with my previous offer. Take it before inflation makes it even worse for both of us!
Alice, let's be real. We're both losing with each passing round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both get something substantial.
